pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, November 14, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Phnom Penh, Cambodia

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Bali, Indonesia.

Closed to media

Bali, Indonesia

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Bali, Indonesia.

Ngurah Rai International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a B20 session entitled “The Role of Digital Economy and Industry 4.0 in Accelerating a Just Energy Transition.”

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President and CEO of Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, Seiji Izumisawa.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
